New Records: Arshdeep Singh achieved his career-best bowling figures of 4-9.
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored an unbeaten 50 off 49 balls.
Shivam Dube remained unbeaten on 31, helping India chase down the target.
Saurabh Netravalkar dismissed both Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma early in the innings.
Hardik Pandya bowled a wicket-maiden in the 17th over, dismissing Corey Anderson.
Pre-Game Insights: USA had never played at Nassau County Stadium before this match, while it was India's fourth game at the venue.
Monank Patel, USA's designated captain, was out injured.
Rohit Sharma won the toss and chose to field in seaming conditions.
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav was praised for his role as a crisis man, bailing India out of a difficult situation.
Shivam Dube's unbeaten 31 in a hard-fought match was seen as a confidence booster for him.
Miscellaneous Highlights: USA were warned twice for delaying the game and were penalized five runs for a third delay.
The match was played in front of thirty-thousand fans, many of whom were Indian-Americans.
